channel.title: CVE Feed for Yi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-3900|2024-08-05T04:57:24.474Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the QR code scanning functionality of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. A specially crafted QR Code can cause a buffer overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker can make the camera scan a QR code to trigger this vulnerability. Alternatively, a user could be convinced to display a QR code from the internet to their camera, which could exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-3947|2024-08-05T04:57:24.460Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the phone-to-camera communications of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. An attacker can sniff network traffic to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-3910|2024-08-05T04:57:24.560Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the cloud OTA setup functionality of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. A specially crafted SSID can cause a command injection, resulting in code execution. An attacker can cause a camera to connect to this SSID to trigger this vulnerability. Alternatively, an attacker can convince a user to connect their camera to this SSID.

item.title: CVE-2018-3928|2024-08-05T04:57:24.450Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the firmware update functionality of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. A specially crafted set of UDP packets can cause a settings change, resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a set of packets to trigger this vulnerability.
